item.title: Preformed Structural Elements Feature in Partner Recognition by Intrinsically Unstructured Proteins
item.description: Notes on 2004 JMB paper exploring how preformed structural elements in intrinsically disordered proteins (IDPs) facilitate efficient binding and partner recognition.
